categories: Category:Ships of the Open Circle Fleet

nodes.text: The Ro-ti-Mundi was a Venator-class Star Destroyer that was in service with the Grand Army of the Republic during the later part of the Clone Wars. This vessel was part of the Open Circle Fleet that participated in the Battle of Coruscant.

Ro-ti-Mundi served as a support carrier in the Republic Navy, and it was from this vessel that Commander Davijaan launched Squad Seven into combat over the Republic capital of Coruscant during the Battle of Coruscant.
